item.title: Get php files in dir with recursive lambda callback function
item.author: Steve Francia
item.description:
Got it all already in the subject line.

Anyway this is a Lambda) function also called anonymous function within a regular function that scans a given directory and it’s sub directories returning an array of all php files within.
